description: A hh3cEponPortAlarmBerTrap notification is sent when
a BER threshold crossing event is detected.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HH3C-EPON-MIB::hh3cEponPortAlarmBerTrap IF-MIB::ifIndex i 9999 IF-MIB::ifDescr s EXAMPLE HH3C-EPON-MIB::hh3cOltPortAlarmBerDirect i 1 HH3C-EPON-MIB::hh3cOltPortAlarmBer u 9999 HH3C-EPON-MIB::hh3cOltPortAlarmBerThreshold i 9999

description: A unique value, greater than zero, for each interface. It
is recommended that values are assigned contiguously
starting from 1. The value for each interface sub-layer
must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of
the entity's network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifIndex

description: A textual string containing information about the
interface. This string should include the name of the
manufacturer, the product name and the version of the
interface hardware/software.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifDescr

description: Traffic direction to monitor for BER alarm.

description: A unique value, greater than zero, for each interface. It
is recommended that values are assigned contiguously
starting from 1. The value for each interface sub-layer
must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of
the entity's network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifIndex

description: A textual string containing information about the
interface. This string should include the name of the
manufacturer, the product name and the version of the
interface hardware/software.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifDescr

description: The hh3cEponOnuSilenceTrap notification is sent when an
unbound ONU try to register to an OLT.

event.Summary: Unbound ONU try to register to an OLT

description: The MAC of silent ONU.

description: The hh3cEponOnuSilenceRecoverTrap notification is sent when

description: A hh3cEponUpdateResultTrap notification is sent when
an ONU reported its firmware update result.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HH3C-EPON-MIB::hh3cEponOnuUpdateResultTrap IF-MIB::ifIndex i 9999 IF-MIB::ifDescr s EXAMPLE HH3C-EPON-MIB::hh3cOnuBindMacAddress s EXAMPL HH3C-EPON-MIB::hh3cOnuUpdateResult i 1 HH3C-EPON-MIB::hh3cOnuRegType s EXAMPLE HH3C-EPON-MIB::hh3cOnuUpdateFileName s EXAMPLE

description: A unique value, greater than zero, for each interface. It
is recommended that values are assigned contiguously
starting from 1. The value for each interface sub-layer
must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of
the entity's network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifIndex

description: A textual string containing information about the
interface. This string should include the name of the
manufacturer, the product name and the version of the
interface hardware/software.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifDescr

description: Bind the MAC of ONU.
While the MAC is not bound, the ONU can not go into
effect and configurations can not be set.
Set 0-0-0 (MAC address) to the EPON device port will
unbind the relationship with the original MAC and
configurations will be set to default values.
variables.name: HH3C-EPON-MIB::hh3cOnuBindMacAddress

description: The ONU firmware update result.
updating - The ONU is updating firmware right now.
ok - The ONU update result is OK.
fail - The ONU update result is fail.
fileNotExist - The ONU update failed because the file does not exist.
notSetFilename - The ONU firmware filename is not set.
fileNotMatchONU - The ONU firmware does not match the ONU.
timeout - The ONU responses timeout.
otherError - The ONU update result is unknown.
variables.name: HH3C-EPON-MIB::hh3cOnuUpdateResult

description: ONU registered type.
variables.name: HH3C-EPON-MIB::hh3cOnuRegType

description: The filename of the ONU firmware to be updated.
Note that the filename must contain the file path.
variables.name: HH3C-EPON-MIB::hh3cOnuUpdateFileName

description: A hh3cEponOnuAutoBindTrap notification is sent
when a silent ONU is bound automatically.
